title: Radisson Blu Guwahati looks to expand current capacity soon
description: Radisson Blu in Guwahati is planning to expand its current capacity as it sees potential for growth in the hospitality industry in India. Nest Asia, the restaurant at Radisson Blu Guwahati, will reopen on July 1, 2023, with strict health and sanitation protocols in place. The Assam government approved an industrial status for the tourism sector last year, making restaurants, spas, and wellness centers eligible for incentives under the industrial policy.
